summary:
A bag of holding/lightness work around.
A new type of potion that increases what you can carry by 5000 units. It lasts for 30 days there is 200 bottles of the stuff in a bag at High Hrothgar.
descriptionHtml:
A bag of holding/lightness work around.
A new type of potion that increases what you can carry by 5000 units. It lasts for 30 days there is 200 bottles of the stuff in a bag at High Hrothgar.

No need to transfer items into/out of your inventory to a knapsack etc.

Some hero of old left part of his kit behind after visiting the Greybeards. It can be found behind the first stone bench as you enter on the left hand side of High Hrothgar. 

I\'m not much of a mod, but this works on my PC, so I assume that it will work on yours.
Just put in your Data folder ( mine is in: Program Files (x86)\\ Steam \\ SteamApps\\ common \\ skyrim \\ Data \\    )

Please place feedback (good or bad) 

Thanks for looking!
Rob.
author: Rob The Bastard

files.name: Bag of Fortify Carry Potions _ 500 units
